title: Quarter finals
body:
Okay.
There is a favourite quarter final coming up:
SKTelecom T1 v ahq e-sports club.

Who would win?
And also by how much? (Leave how much in comments please)

replies.body:
You should put the match up in the heading! other wise it will look like you are spamming a thread called "Quarter Finals" haha

Would love to go for old mate Westdoor...but he has to match up with Easyhoon/Faker combo. I dont think any mid laner can stand up to that.
when is one for all coming out on oce i thought it was meant to come with paatch

Hey man,

One for All will be making a return during patch 5.20! We haven't announced when exactly yet.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-520-notes#patch-featured-game-modes
hey man i really need to know when one for all is coming out i hope it is on thursday cause i wanna start playing
hopefully comes soon cause i want to max my time playing the mode im pretty excited
SKTelecom T1 have got this year in the bag, the whole team is on point

i personally like flash wolves with koo tigers next. Anyway FW will have to verse skt im sure. 
Anyway SKT will win by 8 kills and 2 more dragons. Just a guess
If i get it right then i am a psychic
